casebody.data:
Moses Samelson, Respondent, v. George A. Haggerty, Impleaded, et al, Appellant. Decided June 23, 1887. Appeal from an order denying a motion made by the defendant Haggerty to vacate an order appointing a receiver of mortgaged premises pendente lite.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Truax, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The order appealed from should be affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements.
